nodes.text: The Thuldin's Grant sector was a sector in the Expansion Region that contained the Garen system, which included the planet Garen IV. By 137 ABY, the sector had become part of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire.

The Thuldin's Grant sector was located in the Expansion Region of the galaxy. It was adjacent to the Trailing Grant sector and the Montitian Grant sector, as well as the Freestanding subsectors of the Expansion Region and the Mid Rim. The sector included the Garen system, a star system where the planet Garen IV was located.

The area of space containing the sector was first explored between 1000 BBY and 25 BBY. Garen IV was the location of a penal colony used by the Galactic Empire during their reign, although in 2 BBY, during the Galactic Civil War, the Alliance to Restore the Republic carried out a raid there and freed a number of prisoners. By the year 25 ABY, the average population of the area was less than one million sentient beings per star system. The entire sector was considered part of the galactic empire of the Sith Lord Darth Krayt by the year 137 ABY.

The sector was first identified in Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion an online supplement to the 2009 book The Essential Atlas, which was written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace. The sector was pictured in a map of the Expansion Region released as part of the companion.
